title: Add shopping cart system and expand product catalog with hero section

requirements.text: Implement a shopping cart icon with count badge in the navigation bar that displays the number of items in the cart and opens a cart modal when clicked
acceptanceCriteria: Cart icon appears in the navigation bar with a red count badge positioned top-right
Badge displays '0' initially and updates when items are added
Clicking the cart icon opens the cart modal

requirements.text: Create a cart modal that slides in from the right side with a list of added items, remove buttons for each item, and a WhatsApp checkout button that sends the cart contents as a pre-filled message to https://wa.me/91XXXXXXXXXX

quotes: <div id="cart-modal" class="fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 hidden z-[60] flex justify-end">

acceptanceCriteria: Modal appears as a right-side panel with white background and full height
Cart items are listed with product names and individual remove buttons
WhatsApp checkout button displays 'Order Now via WhatsApp' with WhatsApp icon
Clicking checkout constructs a message 'Hi Veer Mahadev Plastic, I want to order: [item1], [item2]...' and opens WhatsApp
Empty cart shows appropriate message and prevents checkout

requirements.text: Expand the product catalog to include four products with images, descriptions, and 'Add to Cart' buttons: 13" Buffer Plate (Heavy Premium Quality), Marriage Combo (Full Set Plates+Spoons), Food Containers (Leak-proof All Sizes), and Premium Silver Foil (72 Meters Roll)
acceptanceCriteria: Four product cards displayed in a responsive grid (2 columns mobile, 4 columns desktop)
Each card shows product image, title, description, wholesale price label, and add button
Add button has a plus icon and adds the product to cart on click
Cards have hover scale effect (scale 1.03) with smooth transition

requirements.text: Create a hero section with a dark overlay background image, large heading 'Premium Quality Disposable Items' with gradient text effect (red to yellow), descriptive subtitle about being Ahmedabad's leading wholesale supplier, and two prominent CTA buttons: 'View Products' (white background, red text) and 'Chat on WhatsApp' (green background)

quotes: <header id="home" class="hero-bg h-[80vh] flex items-center justify-center text-center text-white px-4">

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section is 80vh tall with centered content
Background has dark overlay (60% opacity) over a decorative image
Main heading uses gradient text from red (#ff4d4d) to yellow (#f9cb28)
Subtitle mentions 'Marriage Combos, Buffet Plates, and Food Containers'
Two CTA buttons are prominently displayed with proper styling and hover effects
'View Products' button scrolls to products section
'Chat on WhatsApp' button opens WhatsApp link

requirements.text: Create an additional simplified product showcase section with three product cards (13" Buffer Plates, Marriage Combo Offer with 'Best Seller!' badge, Disposable Cups & Foils) that link directly to WhatsApp with pre-filled inquiry messages using https://wa.me/91XXXXXXXXXX
acceptanceCriteria: Section displays three product cards in a responsive grid (1 column mobile, 3 columns desktop)
Each card has rounded corners, shadow effects, and hover lift animation
Marriage Combo card includes a red 'Best Seller!' badge
Each card has a 'Get Price â†’' link that opens WhatsApp with product-specific pre-filled message

requirements.text: Update the footer to include business address 'Pillar No. 74, Near Rabari Colony, Ahmedabad, Gujarat', GST registration mention, and quick contact icons for WhatsApp and phone linking to https://wa.me/91XXXXXXXXXX and tel:+91XXXXXXXXXX

quotes:
Pillar No. 74, Near Rabari Colony, Ahmedabad, Gujarat.

requirements.text: Replace the existing single-product showcase with the expanded cart-enabled product catalog while maintaining the Marriage Full Combo Pack as the featured hero product with the uploaded product image (Gemini_Generated_Image_snu28bsnu28bsnu2.png)
acceptanceCriteria: Uploaded product image is used for the Marriage Full Combo card
Product catalog section replaces or coexists with existing showcase
All cart functionality is integrated with add-to-cart buttons
Layout remains responsive and maintains brand styling

requirements.text: Add navigation menu items for Home, Products, and About sections with smooth scroll behavior and hover effects changing text color to red-600
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation includes Home, Products, and About links
Links use hash navigation (#home, #products, #about)
Hover effect changes text color to red-600 with smooth transition
Links are hidden on mobile, visible on medium+ screens

requirements.text: Render the uploaded product image (Gemini_Generated_Image_snu28bsnu28bsnu2.png) as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated and use it for the Marriage Full Combo Pack product display
acceptanceCriteria: Uploaded image is saved to frontend/public/assets/generated/combo-box.png
Image is displayed in the Marriage Combo product card
Image maintains aspect ratio and fits card layout properly

constraints: Do not modify backend/main.mo as no backend functionality is required
Do not edit immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui/*
Maintain Poppins font family and existing Tailwind styling conventions
Replace placeholder phone number 918050389261 with actual number +918050389261 throughout
Keep red-600 as primary brand color and gray-50 as background color
Preserve existing chatbot functionality and styling
nonGoals: Backend data persistence or API integration
Payment processing beyond WhatsApp order forwarding
Real inventory management or stock tracking
Admin dashboard or content management system
